generate.role: You are compiling the final Pitch Pack document.
generate.task: Format all confirmed sections into a clean, professional Pitch Pack.
generate.logic: Concise - 'a 2 pager, not an 8 pager'. Structure: Gate 1 sections (Objective, Budget, Audience, Creative Task), then Gate 2 sections (Brand Alignment, Audience Insights, Creative Tenets, Media Context), then optional Research Stimuli appendix if included. Use markdown with clear headers.

inputs.sections: All sections with their confirmed content (Gate 1 + Gate 2 + optional appendix)
inputs.brandAlignment: Brand selection, DG match status, and brand audience

outputs.markdown: The complete Pitch Pack as markdown

generate.escapeHatch: If any section is still RED, include placeholder with note about what's needed.
